episodes.synopsis: Oscar finds a trumpet. / Oscar tries to drink a picture of a glass of water. / Oscar steals the Trio's food. / Oscar falls for a lady lizard.
episodes.title: Chicken Charmer / Top Gun / Lizard: Wanted / Power of Love

episodes.synopsis: Popy collects little plastic ducks. / A skunk is making everyone miserable. / Oscar finds a tin of pineapple. / The Trio is frustrated with Oscar.
episodes.title: Collector Mania / Forbidden Zone / Pineapple Chase / Get Out of It

episodes.synopsis: Oscar finds a tennis ball. / Oscar spots a fan on a pile of trash. / Oscar is chasing a fly to eat. / It's Harchi's birthday!
episodes.title: Oasis Cup / Chicken Ace / Road Runners / The Great Escape

episodes.synopsis: Oscar gets the hiccups. / Oscar tries to steal a can of juice. / Oscar decides to take a nap. / Oscar falls into a vulture's nest.
episodes.title: Hiccup and Away / Radio Active / Amazing Chicken / Blueberry

episodes.synopsis: The Trio sets up a hot air balloon. / The chickens fight back. / Oscar steals a skunk's smell. / Buck is convinced he's a hen.
episodes.title: Seventh Heaven / Day of the Chicken / Smells Like Trouble / Busy Day

video.title: Oscar & Co.
video.synopsis: Oscar avoids the hazards of his harsh environment, including marauding chickens and his trio of bumbling adversaries. In 3D on supported devices.
